page.title: 14B.M.X. BIKES - CALNE TRACK
page.content: B.M.X. bikes were first common in 1980.They are light bikes with plastic wheel rims called "mags" or "ukies".They are not made for riding to work, they are made for fun, for stunts and races.One of the stunts you can try is called a "Wheelie", this is when you pull the front wheel off the ground and ride on the back one only. An "Endow" is when you lift the back wheel and ride on the front wheel only.When you lift all the wheels off the ground it is called a "Bunny hop".The best B.M.X. track in Calne is Bentley Wood.It is 50 metres by 25 metres,the ramps are made of mud. There is one small jump, two camel humps and two big jumps. Lots of people use it, nearly always boys aged from about 8-9years up to 15 or 16 years old.
